main: ^What were you doing when you found the body?

c-0: ^Of course. I'm perfectly fine. Something like this wouldn't- doesn't phase me at all.
c-1: ^I was just looking through the library and I saw Garry right there.
^I thought it was part of this fun game at first, so I played along.
^Then when I grabbed his arm he…
^He was so cold… And I panicked and screamed. Then everyone else came running in…
^You didn’t notice anything else when you came in here?
^No… No… Just Gary’s cold… dead body.
